Sentencas: Yttria and zirconia co-doped ceria ceramics is a promising material for solid electrolytes for intermediate -temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFC).
Titulo: The effect of the sintering parameters on the structure and oxygen ion conductivity of Y2O3-ZrO2-CeO2 ceramics

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity of ceramics significantly depends on Ce 3+admixture presence, which can be controlled by heat treatment regimes.
Titulo: The effect of the sintering parameters on the structure and oxygen ion conductivity of Y2O3-ZrO2-CeO2 ceramics

Sentencas: In the current study we report the detailed electrochemical and structural study of 10Y2O3-30ZrO2-60CeO2 ceramics manufactured via two-step sintering approach.
Titulo: The effect of the sintering parameters on the structure and oxygen ion conductivity of Y2O3-ZrO2-CeO2 ceramics

Sentencas: The effects of the second sintering step on the phase composition, homogeneity of compo-nents distribution, grain growth and the microstructures of ceramics wereinvestigated via XRD, SEM, Raman spectroscopy techniques.
Titulo: The effect of the sintering parameters on the structure and oxygen ion conductivity of Y2O3-ZrO2-CeO2 ceramics

Sentencas: Special attention was paid to valence state of cerium ions, which was examined via XPS.
Titulo: The effect of the sintering parameters on the structure and oxygen ion conductivity of Y2O3-ZrO2-CeO2 ceramics

Sentencas: Using impedance spectroscopy it was shown that ternary ceramics possesses ionic conductivity up to 2.09 & sdot;10-3 S/ cm at 973 K in the N2 atmosphere and at the residual oxygen partial pressure no more than 10-3 atm.
Titulo: The effect of the sintering parameters on the structure and oxygen ion conductivity of Y2O3-ZrO2-CeO2 ceramics
